name: jira
description: Jira integration plugin for Claude Code - zero dependencies, direct API calls based on OpenAPI spec. Create, view, search, and manage Jira issues with no MCP or external libraries required.

setup.instructions:
To use this plugin, you need to configure your Jira credentials:

1. Get your Jira API token from https://id.atlassian.com/manage-profile/security/api-tokens
2. Add the following to your .claude/settings.json:

{
  "env": {
    "JIRA_HOST": "your-domain.atlassian.net",
    "JIRA_EMAIL": "your-email@example.com",
    "JIRA_API_TOKEN": "your-api-token"
  }
}

3. Restart Claude Code

Available commands:
- /jira-create - Create a new Jira issue
- /jira-get - View issue details
- /jira-search - Search issues with JQL
- /jira-my-issues - View your assigned issues
- /jira-update - Update an issue
- /jira-comment - Add a comment
- /jira-transition - Change issue status
